Parameters.Name: deployer_tfstate_key
Parameters.Description: The state file name for the deployer

Parameters.Name: tfstate_resource_id
Parameters.Description: Azure resource identifier for the Storage account in the SAP Library that will contain the Terraform state files

Parameters.Name: subscription
Parameters.Description: The subscription id

Parameters.Name: resourcegroup_arm_id
Parameters.Description: Provide an existing resource group for the deployment

Parameters.Name: resourcegroup_name
Parameters.Description: Override the name of the resource group that will be provisioned

Parameters.Name: network_address_arm_id
Parameters.Description: Specifies Azure resource identifier for the existing virtual network

Parameters.Name: admin_subnet_arm_id
Parameters.Description: Specifies Azure resource identifier for the existing subnet to use

Parameters.Name: admin_subnet_name
Parameters.Description: Should only be used if the default naming is not acceptable

Parameters.Name: admin_subnet_nsg_arm_id
Parameters.Description: Specifies Azure resource identifier for the existing network security group to use

Parameters.Name: admin_subnet_nsg_name
Parameters.Description: Should only be used if the default admin network security group name is not acceptable

Parameters.Name: db_subnet_arm_id
Parameters.Description: Specifies Azure resource identifier for the existing subnet to use

Parameters.Name: db_subnet_name
Parameters.Description: Should only be used if the default naming is not acceptable

Parameters.Name: db_subnet_nsg_arm_id
Parameters.Description: Specifies Azure resource identifier for the existing network security group to use

Parameters.Name: db_subnet_nsg_name
Parameters.Description: Should only be used if the default database network security group name is not acceptable

Parameters.Name: app_subnet_arm_id
Parameters.Description: Specifies Azure resource identifier for the existing subnet to use

Parameters.Name: app_subnet_name
Parameters.Description: Should only be used if the default naming is not acceptable

Parameters.Name: app_subnet_nsg_arm_id
Parameters.Description: Specifies Azure resource identifier for the existing network security group to use

Parameters.Name: app_subnet_nsg_name
Parameters.Description: Should only be used if the default application network security group name is not acceptable

Parameters.Name: web_subnet_arm_id
Parameters.Description: Specifies Azure resource identifier for the existing subnet to use

Parameters.Name: web_subnet_name
Parameters.Description: Should only be used if the default naming is not acceptable

Parameters.Name: web_subnet_nsg_arm_id
Parameters.Description: Specifies Azure resource identifier for the existing network security group to use

Parameters.Name: web_subnet_nsg_name
Parameters.Description: Should only be used if the default web network security group name is not acceptable

Parameters.Name: iscsi_subnet_arm_id
Parameters.Description: Specifies Azure resource identifier for the existing subnet

Parameters.Name: iscsi_subnet_address_prefix
Parameters.Description: Mandatory parameter if the subnets are not defined in the workload or if existing subnets are not used

Parameters.Name: iscsi_subnet_name
Parameters.Description: Should only be used if the default naming is not acceptable

Parameters.Name: iscsi_subnet_nsg_arm_id
Parameters.Description: Specifies Azure resource identifier for the existing network security group to use

Parameters.Name: iscsi_subnet_nsg_name
Parameters.Description: Should only be used if the default naming is not acceptable for the network security group name

Parameters.Name: anf_subnet_arm_id
Parameters.Description: Specifies Azure resource identifier for the existing subnet

Parameters.Name: anf_subnet_address_prefix
Parameters.Description: Mandatory parameter if the subnets are not defined in the workload or if existing subnets are not used

Parameters.Name: anf_subnet_name
Parameters.Description: Should only be used if the default naming is not acceptable

Parameters.Name: use_ANF
Parameters.Description: Controlls if Azure NetApp files is used for storage

Parameters.Name: ANF_account_arm_id
Parameters.Description: Azure resource identifier for an existing Netapp Account

Parameters.Name: ANF_account_name
Parameters.Description: The name for the Netapp Account

Parameters.Name: ANF_service_level
Parameters.Description: The service level for the NetApp pool

Parameters.Name: ANF_pool_size
Parameters.Description: The pool size in TB for the NetApp pool

Parameters.Name: use_private_endpoint
Parameters.Description: Controlls if the keyvaults and storage accounts have private endpoints

Parameters.Name: anf_subnet_nsg_arm_id
Parameters.Description: Specifies Azure resource identifier for the existing subnet

Parameters.Name: anf_subnet_nsg_name
Parameters.Description: Should only be used if the default naming is not acceptable for the network security group name

Parameters.Name: user_keyvault_id
Parameters.Description: Designed to host secrets for the administrative users. Specifies the Azure resource identifier for an existing keyvault

Parameters.Name: automation_keyvault_id
Parameters.Description: Designed to host secrets for the automation solution. Specifies the Azure resource identifier for an existing keyvault

Parameters.Name: enable_purge_control_for_keyvaults
Parameters.Description: Used to disable the purge protection for Azure keyvaults

Parameters.Name: spn_keyvault_id
Parameters.Description: Designed to host the SPN credentials used by the automation. Specifies the Azure resource identifier for an existing keyvault

Parameters.Name: automation_password
Parameters.Description: Used to provide a password for the automation user. If empty, Terraform will create a password and persist it in keyvault

Parameters.Name: automation_path_to_public_key
Parameters.Description: Used to provide a path to an existing ssh public key file. If empty, Terraform will create the ssh key and persist it in keyvault

Parameters.Name: automation_path_to_private_key
Parameters.Description: Used to provide a path to an existing ssh private key file. If empty, Terraform will create the ssh key and persist it in keyvault

Parameters.Name: dns_label
Parameters.Description: Provides the DNS label for the Virtual Network

Parameters.Name: dns_resourcegroup_name
Parameters.Description: Provides the name of the resource group hosting the Private DNS zone

Parameters.Name: NFS_provider
Parameters.Description: Defines how NFS services are provided to the SAP systems: AFS (Azure Files for NFS), ANF (Azure NetApp Files), NFS (custom solution)
